EmailTemplate.subject: Your Business Account with Office Depot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you again for taking the time to speak with me today!
Per our conversation, my name is () and I am excited to be your Office Depot Program Manager, leading the team that supports your account!
Here at Office Depot, it is our continuing goal to satisfy and support you to the very best of our ability. As such, we have recently made some big changes within our organization that will better help us to meet your needs and strengthen our relationship with you!
My personal goal as your dedicated program manager is to become a trusted resource and adviser to you and your organization. The team I lead that supports your account consists of specialty representatives in the following solution areas:
• Furniture: Chairs, File cabinets, remodels / buildouts • Copy & Print: Custom marketing and print solutions • Technology Services: Hardware, software and services (recent purchase of CompuCom) • Janitorial solutions: All the cleaning supplies and tools your organization needs. • Breakroom solutions: Coffee / Tea, Snacks, water, and custom beverage services - anything needed for your breakroom
I look forward to our next conversation where I hope to learn as much as I can about your organization to be of maximum value.
If you ever have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to call me. Myself and my team are here to assist in making sure your experience with Office Depot is world class.
Thank you for your business and partnership!
Chris Gregory chris.gregory@officedepot.com (855)DEPOT11 ext. 12740 https://business.officedepot.com Customer Service: (888) 263-3423
